title: Frederick Law Olmsted National Historic Site: Special Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Special Events               Olmsted NHS Events         Olmsted ranger giving talk in Emerald Necklace NPS     Stay tuned for special programs and walks during the Fall 2016! Locations will include World's End, Jamaica Pond, Franklin Park, and our previously rained out complete Emerald Necklace!             Friends of Fairsted Lecture Series           In Recognition of the 100th Anniversary of the National Park Service AMERICA'S BEST IDEA: FAIRSTED, THE OLMSTEDS AND OUR NATIONAL PARKS     Please visit the Friends of Fairsted website for more information about their upcoming spring lecture, "Parks: Cornerstones of Civic Revitalization."   Thanks for attending, National Parks and the "Fairsted School": An Enduring Legacy By Ethan Carr PhD, FASLA, landscape historian, award-winning author and professor at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst.
